data.text: Kɨ akar mam Kraisɨn adarazir gumazamizir dapanibav kɨmasa, kɨ uaghan ian mɨn Kraisɨn adarazir gumazir dapanir mam. Nan damazimɨn, kɨ uabɨ Kraisɨn garima, a mɨzazim ini. Egh gɨn Krais uan gavgavim ko ziar ekiam sara uamategh izam. Eghtɨ dughiar kamɨn kɨ uaghan ia ko, e bar moghɨra an atrivimɨn angazangarimɨn ganɨva an aven ikiam. Kamaghɨn amizɨ kɨ ingarasa Kraisɨn adarazir gumazamizir dapaniba ia mɨgei.

5:2 Jon 10:11-13; 21:15-17; Aposel 20:28; 1 Korin 9:17; Taitus 1:7; 1:11; Filemon 1:14; 1 Pita 3:1-6Ia Godɨn gumazamiziba deravɨra men gan. Me sipsipbar mɨn ian agharimɨn iti. Tav ia ingangarir kam damusɨ ia abɨntɨma, ia ingaran markɨ. Ia ingangarir kam damuasa God ifonge. Kamaghɨn, ia ifueghɨva ingangarir kam damu. Ia ivezim baghɨva akongɨva ingangarim damuan markɨ. Egh ia gumazamizibar akurvaghsɨ bar ifongegh.

5:3 2 Korin 1:24; Filipai 3:17; 1 Timoti 4:12; Taitus 2:7Ia gumazamizir aruabar mɨn ikian markɨ, egh Godɨn gumazamiziba dɨkabɨnan markɨ, gumazamizir kaba God me isa ian agharim gatɨ. Ia arazir aghuibar me damu, eghtɨ me ian arazibar ganɨva dar gɨn mangam.
5:4 1 Korin 9:25; 2 Timoti 4:8; Hibru 13:20; 1 Pita 1:4Eghtɨ dughiar sipsipbar garir gumazir Ekiam azenim girɨghtɨ, ia ivezir bar aghuim iniam, ivezir bar deravɨra itim, a ikuvighan kogham.
Ezɨ kamaghɨra, ia gumazamizir igiaba, ia gumazamizir aruabar apengan ikɨ. Egh ia bar uari abɨrir arazimɨn gɨn mangɨva egh uaghan Godɨn gumazamizibar apengan ikɨ. Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei:
Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia uan ifongiaba abɨnɨva Godɨn agharir gavgavimɨn apengan ikɨ. Eghtɨ dughiar God ifongezim a ia fegham.
5:7 Onger Akaba 37:5; 55:22; Matyu 6:25-30; Filipai 4:6God ia gɨnɨghnɨsi, kamaghɨn amizɨ osɨmtɨzir ia ateriba, ia da isɨ Godɨn agharim darɨgh.
Ia angamɨra ikɨ, uari bagh gan. Satan, gumazir ian apanimɨn itir kam, a laionɨn mɨn tiarim akara diagharui. A zurara gumazamizibar amasa me buriagharui.

5:9 Aposel 14:22; Efesus 6:11-13; 2 Timoti 3:12; Jems 4:7Ia fo, Godɨn gumazamizir nguazir kamɨn itiba, me uaghan mɨzazir ia isir kaba isi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ ia bar nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn tugh gavgavigh Satan batogh.

God, an apangkuvibar mɨngarim. Ia Kraisɨn porozɨma God ian diazɨ, ia a ko ikɨ mamaghɨra ikiam. Egh ia dughiar bar otevimɨn mɨzaziba iniam, egh gɨn a uabɨ ua ia damightɨ ia ua deragham. Egh gavgavim ian nɨghnɨzir gavgavibar anɨngɨva, egh ia damutɨ ia tuivigh gavgavigh mamaghɨra ikiam.
Ezɨ God uabɨra zurazurara gavgavir ikia mamaghɨra itim iti. Bar guizbangɨra.

Sailas nan akuragha, ia bagha akɨnafarir otevir kam osiri. Kɨ an garima, a Krais baghavɨra itir aveghbuar aghuim. Ezɨ akɨnafarir kam, kɨ God uan apangkuvim ian akazir arazim ia mɨkɨmasa. Kɨ uabɨ kɨ fo, kar guizbangɨra Godɨn apangkuvim, egha kɨ deravɨra an gun ia mɨgei. Egha kɨ akar gavgavim ia ganɨdi, ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn apangkuvimɨn ikɨ tugh gavgafigh.

Godɨn gumazamizir Babilonɨn itiba, God me ko ia mɨsevezɨ, me ia bagha akam amaga ghaze, Afeziam ia ko ikɨ.5:13a Babilon arazir kurabagh amir nguibam. Ezɨ Pita Romɨn itir dughiam, Rom tintinimɨn arazir kurabar Godɨn gumazamizibagh ami, mati Babilon fomɨra me gamizir arazim mokɨn. Kamaghɨn Pita akar isɨn zuimɨn Rom dɨbora ghaze, Babilon. Nan otarim Mak, a uaghan ia bagha akam amaga ghaze, Afeziam ia ko ikɨ.5:13b Mak guizɨn Polɨn otarim puvatɨ. A gumazir ighiar an akurvagha an gɨn aruim.
5:14 Rom 16:16; 1 Korin 16:20; Efesus 6:23Ia igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazim akaghsɨ, ia uari uan agharibar suigh. Ia Kraisɨn adarasi, ia navir amɨrizimɨn ikɨ.
